name: mini snowbuddies
notes:
construction
mini snowbuddies are knit in one piece from the bottom-up.  the dollâ€™s body can be knit flat on straight needles and seamed, or knit in the round on dpns.  simple sewing techniques are used to define the arms and legs after knitting.  very fast and fun to knit, these dolls are designed to be sturdy, safe, and perfect for even the littlest hands to hold.  

gauge
exact gauge is not important. choose a needle 2 or 3 sizes smaller than recommended on the ball band to create a dense fabric that will keep the stuffing hidden

yarn
models are knit from dk yarn on 3.25 mm needles and measure 10cm (4 inches) tall.

abbreviations
co = cast on; k = knit; k2tog = knit 2 stitches together; kfb = knit front and back of the same stitch; p = purl; rs = right side;  st(s) = stitch(es); ws = wrong side
